title: Asparagus Stir-Fry
description: A favorite stir-fry recipe. Asparagus and tofu form the base, but it has quite a lot going on beyond that. You get a bite of tang from the lime, heat from the red chiles and fresh ginger, mint and basil cool things down. A touch of hoisin sauce gives you just enough sweetness to balance it all out. Continue reading Asparagus Stir-Fry on 101 Cookbooks
author: Heidi Swanson
